RIIZE until Oct 14, 2024

Introduction

Seunghan is a South Korean member of the boy group RIIZE. On September 4, 2023, he made his debut in RIIZE with the single album "Get A Guitar".

On July 2, 2022, he was revealed as one of the new members of SM Entertainment's SMROOKIES trainee team. He was announced as a member of RIIZE on August 1, 2023.

On November 21, 2023, SM Entertainment announced Seunghan's indefinite withdrawal from RIIZE due to the leak of his personal information and private life, to prevent further harm to the group.

On October 10, 2024, SM Entertainment announced Seunghan's return to RIIZE, resuming activities in November. However, on October 13, 2024, they retracted this, stating that Seunghan had left the group instead.
